Text: Hell yeah this is what Im talking about. Thank you. Chinese are stealing gold from Africa as we learn from this show but they are also stealing oil from the middle east.

Classification: Documentary
Genre: Adventure | Family
Status: New Series
Network: Discovery Channel ( USA)
Airs: Fridays at 10:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: October 26, 2012

With their futures on the line, they make a bold decision to risk it all to mine for gold in the West African jungles of Ghana, a region with vast reserves of gold-rich ground that could ensure even these rookies with aging machinery can strike it rich.
